item.title: Thomas Cathcart's greek philosopher joke books
item.description: About the book Author: Cathcart, Thomas (1940- ) and Daniel Klein. Title: Plato and a platypus walk into a bar…: Understanding philosophy through jokes. (2006) Publication: New York : Abrams Image, 2006. ISBN 9781456102821. DAISY audio format narrated by Johnny Heller. CELA library call number DC46041. 224 pages in the paperback edition; 4 hrs., 9 min. as a recorded book. Title: Aristotle and an aardvark go to Washington: Understanding political doublespeak through philosophy and jokes.
